overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence on multiple social media platforms, with a total of 3,580 followers. Engagement varies across platforms, with significant interaction seen on posts related to research announcements and new opportunities. The content primarily revolves around computational methods, disinformation studies, and academic openings.
